Name: Tribe War
About the game: It is a strategic card game (SCG) that combines the genre of card game and chess. Create original decks, summon monster cards, and use magic cards to target your opponent's stronghold In a chessboard-type field, summon a monster card around the base camp and move the object to break through the opponent's defense and destroy the base camp. Each object is different from the way it moves, and there are some objects with special abilities. The magic card can neutralize the opponent's defense or strengthen your own defense. Stores, card packs, and new species will be added in the future.
